recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of Personal Information should be directed to the PerkinElmer General Counsel.  PerkinElmer will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of Personal Information in accordance with this Policy. If a complaint cannot be resolved between PerkinElmer and the European employee(s) whose Personal Information is involved, PerkinElmer will cooperate in the dispute resolution procedures of the appropriate data protection authority.
